comment.author: 29598412@N00
comment._content: Might be part of the honor guard for the HMS Natal, the ship that brought the body of Whitelaw Reid back from Britain along with the USS North Dakota and others. The date would be right 1/2/1913. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/USS_Florida_(BB-30) en.wikipedia.org/wiki/USS_North_Dakota
